      IAction InputManager.associateAction(net.java.games.input.Controller controller, net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier component, IAction action, IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE actionType)
      associateAction() causes the IInputManager object to associate an IAction (for example, "walk forward", "fire weapon", etc) with the activation of a specific component of a specific controller.
